STARTING EQUIPMENT

Simple Jerkin, Leather Boots Hand Crossbow Instrument of Choice (Hand Drum, Lute, Flute, Lyre or Violin) Health Potion x2, Scroll of Revivify

BARD SPELLCASTING

Full Spellcasters: Unlocks new spell level every 2 Bard levels, up to level 6 spells. Cantrips: Starts with 2 Cantrips (gains additional cantrips at level 5 & 10) Spell Save DC: 8 + your Proficiency bonus + your Charisma modifier Spell Attack Modif
